name: Arkar Portfolio
title: Web and Mobile App Developer
about_me: I'm a passionate full-stack web and mobile app developer with a strong focus on creating dynamic websites and seamless mobile experiences. I thrive on solving complex problems and building solutions that enhance user experiences.

Currently, I'm a Senior Associate Engineer at Pro Empire where I work on a cross-border e-commerce platform. My work involves developing the Seller Centre for shop management using React, a Delivery Management System for logistics operations, and a Customer Mobile App built with Flutter to provide a smooth shopping experience. The backend is developed using Go to ensure efficient performance and scalability.
Previously, as a Junior Developer at Klonotech, I was involved in developing web applications, including CMS system, School Management System and Hotel Management System using Laravel and Vuejs.
